name: Math Game (itch)
description:
Learn addition, substraction and multiplication. This game is ideal for everyone to improve math skills and have fun at the same time.

Perfect for kids to improve their grades at school and test their brains while they solve mathematics quiz.

4 Levels : 2 different modes with easy and hard math quizes. Easy children school multiplication and hard math equations (addition and substraction).

Its a competitive game with time. You have to make as quick as you can to solve the math quizes and beat your friends best score.

Math Game is an educational game for everyone.
